name: sfumato
description: sfumato is a lightweight Sass framework for scalable viewport width-based responsive websites.

scripts.sfumato-build-dev: node-sass --linefeed lf --output-style expanded --source-comments --source-map true styleguide/scss/ --output styleguide/stylesheets/
scripts.sfumato-watch-dev: node-sass --linefeed lf --output-style expanded --source-comments --source-map true --watch styleguide/scss/ --output styleguide/stylesheets/
scripts.watch-sfumato: npm run sfumato-build-dev && npm run sfumato-watch-dev
scripts.watch-sfumato-release: npm run sfumato-build-release && npm run sfumato-watch-release
scripts.sfumato-win-build-dev: node-sass --linefeed lf --output-style expanded --source-comments --source-map true styleguide\scss\ --output styleguide\stylesheets\
scripts.sfumato-win-watch-dev: node-sass --linefeed lf --output-style expanded --source-comments --source-map true --watch styleguide\scss\ --output styleguide\stylesheets\
scripts.win-watch-sfumato: npm run sfumato-win-build-dev && npm run sfumato-win-watch-dev
scripts.win-watch-sfumato-release: npm run sfumato-win-build-release && npm run sfumato-win-watch-release

author: Michael Argentini
